name: Seductive Solitude
storyline: You are a detective who has just returned to the house where the Smith family lived, because your grandparents are missing and this was their last address and so you decided to find them. But what you don't know is that this decision is going to be a horror trip for you. Because this house is not empty and the Smiths still live here. By solving the puzzles and mysteries in this horror house you get all the informations about the Smith family, what is happening here and about your grandparents. But don’t lose yourself along the way and, most importantly try to survive!
summary: Seductive Solitude is a horror adventure game. Where you need to escape from the house by solving the mysterys, but do not be too insightful, because you are not alone and the house is changing.
